creditline: Gift of Eric Brecher, Koplin Del Rio, and the 30 artists who participated in the production of this work of art
description:
recto: black and white close-up portrait of a young woman with dark brown hair painted on small grids; girl is facing mostly forward, mouth closed, eyes looking off to PR; girl is wrapped in fuzzy blanket; focus/pixilation changes over grids
verso: bricklike collage of variously sized rectangles with differing textures and motifs; many of the segments are covered in gold leaf or foil, while others are painted: incised tree ring pattern in gold foil ULC; panel with bubble wrap pattern in gold; trompe l'oeil satin fabric; painted ring or brooch, and billowing clouds; etching of eyes and bridge of nose in gold foil at C; wires and rooftops in negative image in gold leaf LRC
medium: Acrylic, gold leaf, foil, gold pigment and glitter on wood
title: At 25 (recto and verso)
